original_text: And Moses said unto the children of Gad and to the children of Reuben, Shall your brethren go to war, and shall ye sit here?
korean_text: 모세가 갓 자손과 르우벤 자손에게 이르되 너희 형제들은 싸우러 가거늘 너희는 여기 앉아 있고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: And Moses said unto the children of Gad
and to the children of Reuben
Shall your brethren go to war
